remarks: A complex Banach space is a normed complex vector space with a complete induced metric.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Dec-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
iscbn.x $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
iscbn.8 $e |- D = ( IndMet ` U ) $.
iscbn $p |- ( U e. CBan <-> ( U e. NrmCVec /\ D e. ( CMet ` X ) ) ) $.
